description:
Chopper and Carrot use the mirror dimension to get in touch with Nami and Jimbei! Luffy makes it through more obstacles to learn that he just missed Sanji! Meanwhile, Sanji wonders alone about the best course of action.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chateau Douran: Luffy Yakusoku no Basho e
Das Château in Aufruhr! – Ruffy, auf zum Treffpunkt!
Le château dans la tourmente. Luff, au rendez-vous
The Chateau in Turmoil! Luffy, to the Rendezvous!
Переполох в замке! Луффи бежит на встречу!
城内[シャトー]動乱 ルフィ約束の場所へ
